name: PACHIN KO
description:
You've  morphed into a pachinko ball! Traverse a tricky  reversed pachinko palace with a rocket. Avoid all metal objects and gather all the potato chips to win the heart of the beautiful princess Zodiac.

A short Windows PC game made for Ludwig Jam 2021.


Controls:

  1. Move: Arrow Keys
  2. Fly: Z
  3. Pause/Options Menu: Enter

Also compatible and tested with the Xbox One controller.
